art-pieces.name: Flapper girl
art-pieces.description: Flappers were young, fast-moving, fast-talking, reckless and unfazed by previous social conventions or taboos as displayed.

art-pieces.name: Untitled
art-pieces.description: The artist uses bright colours to depict the vibrancy of our diverse Indian culture (Folk and Classical). Various dance and musical forms are regularly shown in his works.

art-pieces.name: Starry night lakeview
art-pieces.description: This mid-scale, oil-on-canvas painting is dominated by a moon- and star-filled night sky

art-pieces.name: Sunset on the bay
art-pieces.description: The awesome beauty of the setting sun is also symbolic of the beauty and mystery of life itself. As the sun sets, light fades, which is symbolic of the forces of darkness.

art-pieces.name: Kerala temples
art-pieces.description: It express the love the artist has for Indian culture, Indian heritage, and Indian mural art

art-pieces.name: Internal struggle of lust
art-pieces.description: This is tango,which is a dance. In fact, the dancers hold everything under control, including feelings.

art-pieces.name: Simply Whitney
art-pieces.description: Whitney Elizabeth Houston was an American singer and actress.Houston influenced many singers in popular music .

art-pieces.name: No title
art-pieces.description: Jackiewicz's work is psychedelic, but relies on patterns of geometry and art to base his imagery in the preexisting lines of art history.

art-pieces.name: Dance
art-pieces.description: Simple and direct, the painting speaks volumes about our deep-rooted, primal human desire for connection, movement, rhythm and music.

art-pieces.name: Girl with a Pearl Earring
art-pieces.description: It portrays her looking over her shoulder, locking her eyes with the viewer as if attempting to establish an intimate connection across the centuries.

art-pieces.name: The Harvesters
art-pieces.description: A group of peasants on the left cut and bundle ripened wheat, while the on the right, another group takes their midday meal.

art-pieces.name: Liberty Leading the People
art-pieces.description: Combining allegory with contemporary elements, the painting is a thrilling example of the Romantic style, as members of different classes unite behind her to storm a barricade strewn with the bodies of fallen comrades
